options.result_text: You try to force the door open,@w0050 but it won't budge!@w0500
The door stays sturdy,@w0050 not giving so much as a rattle.@w0500

The room around you,@w0050 like the house outside,@w0050 is made of barren plywood.@w0500 The only light source is a large frosted-glass window situated in the front door.@w0500 There are two large boxes in the right and leftmost corners in front of you.@w0500 A big-brimmed hat and a long trench coat hang on a metal hook against the left wall.@w0500 There are no other doors or windows.@w0500
You examine the room more closely.@w0500 To your surprise,@w0050 you find a small wooden trapdoor on the ceiling that you hadn't noticed before.@w0500

options.option_text: Pull a box over to reach the trapdoor

options.result_text: You attempt to smash the window with your fist.@w0500 Great job!@w0500 Now your hand hurts.@w0500
You attempt to smash the window again.@w0500 The pain in your fist makes you want to cry.@w0500
The window again dismisses your hit.@w0500 Your knuckles are cracked and bleeding.@w0500
The window has small red stains on its frosted glass.@w0500 The cracks on your hand get larger.@w0500
The window has small red streaks on its frosted glass.@w0500 The cracks on your hand get larger.@w0500
The almighty window is unamused.@w0500 You only achieve further self harm.@w0500

Your hands seem to be moving on their own now.@w0500 The only thing you can make out is blood.@w0500 Blood everywhere.@w0500 Blood on the window.@w0500 Blood on the floor.@w0500 Blood seeping into your shoes.@w0500 Blood dripping down your clothes.@w0500 As you get further in,@w0050 it only gets more pronounced.@w0500 Blood.@w0500 Blood.@w0500 Blood.@w0500

There is no going back now.@w0500 Panic builds in your body as you attempt to stop,@w0050 but the more panicked you get,@w0050 the harder you pound.@w0500 Broken bone sticks out of your knuckles and the tips of your fingers,@w0050 pulling nerves and blood vessels up along with it.@w0500 Chunks of your hands begin to fall on the floor.@w0500 Slowly but surely,@w0050 the gashes turn to missing fingers,@w0050 blown holes,@w0050 and pulverized bits of bone,@w0050 all of which fall to the floor.@w0500 You feel yourself become weaker,@w0050 your face getting cold as blood leaks out of you like a fountain.@w0500 You fall backward and land with the thud of wood.@w0500@d0080 Your ears let out a high-pitched ring as you see and feel everything@d0115 steadily fade@w0600 to black.@w0500

You examine the hat and coat against the left wall.@w0500 The hat is made of fine leather,@w0050 the coat of breathable black silk.@w0500 Upon closer inspection,@w0050 they both look incredibly old and tattered.@w0500 The silk especially looks very,@w0050 very dirty.@w0500 Deep slash marks cover the surface of the two objects,@w0050 as if someone cut into them repeatedly with a knife.@w0500 You take a closer inspection and-@w0050 woah.@w0500 Woah.@w0500 Woah!@w0500 Inside the hat,@w0050 cleverly covered by the angle of the hat,@w0030 is a human skull,@w0030 with lidless,@w0025 bloodshot eyes staring back out at you.@w0500 You instinctively jump back as it unhooks itself from the sharp metal hook.@w0500 The ground shakes as it hits the ground.@w0500 You hear a sharp clicking sound and see a large black hole growing around the front door.@w0500 The skeleton draws its sword and slashes!@w0500 What do you do?

options.hatchet: You open the left box to find a hatchet with a wooden handle and an unpolished head. Suddenly, you hear a sharp clicking sound. A large black hole is forming around the front door! The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside! You jump back instinctively as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes! What do you do?
options.dagger: You open the left box to find a small dagger with ornate engravings on the blade and hilt with a medium ruby on either side of said hilt. Suddenly, you hear a sharp clicking sound. A large black hole is forming around the front door! The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside! You jump back instinctively as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes! What do you do?
options.nightstick: You open the left box to find a collapsable nightstick made of heavy metal and painted a sleek black. Suddenly, you hear a sharp clicking sound. A large black hole is forming around the front door! The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside! You jump back instinctively as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes! What do you do?
options.spider_live: You open the left box and find a large tarantula inside that hisses and lunges! You instinctively duck, just barely preventing the arachnid from landing on you. Suddenly, you hear a sharp clicking sound. A large black hole is forming around the front door! The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside! You jump back instinctively as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes! What do you do?
options.spider_die: You open the left box and find a large tarantula inside that hisses and lunges! You attempt to duck, but not quite fast enough. The spider sinks its fangs into your jugular, and you feel the venom slowly circulate throughout your body. Fire builds up in your body as you feel everything steadily fade to black.
options.head: You open the left box to find a severed head staring up at you. It moves two glazed eyes in your direction and screams! The painful sound brings you to your knees, hands over your ears, as you feel something large hit the ground. You turn to look, and the hat and coat have sprung to life, with a skeleton inside! It draws a sword and slashes! What do you do?
options.empty: You open the left box to find nothing inside. Suddenly, you hear a sharp clicking sound. A large black hole is forming around the front door! The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside! You jump back instinctively as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes! What do you do?

options.hatchet: You open the right box to find a hatchet with a wooden handle and an unpolished head, which you promptly pick up. Suddenly, you hear a sharp clicking sound. A large black hole is forming around the front door! The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside! You press yourself against the wall as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes! What do you do?

Suddenly, you hear a sharp clicking sound. A large black hole is forming around the front door! The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside! The spider sinks its fangs into your jugular, and you feel the venom slowly circulate throughout your body. Fire builds up in your body as you feel everything steadily fade to black.
options.head: You open the right box to find a severed head staring up at you. It moves two glazed eyes in your direction and screams! The painful sound brings you to your knees, hands over your ears, as you feel something large hit the ground. You turn to look, and the hat and coat have sprung to life, with a skeleton inside! It draws a sword and slashes! What do you do?

The hat and coat on the coatrack spring to life as you discover that there's a skeleton inside! You press yourself against the wall as the skeleton draws a sword and slashes! What do you do?

options.result_text: Contrary to the barren plywood room, the door itself has been painted a muted white, with a darkened metallic handle. Both look brand new. In addition, a large frosted window sits just within your reach.
You sit on the floor and cry. Feels good.
